::Spears::

She didn't want to tellhim too much of her past.

"I was..a..with some friends.  We were on the side of a building back 
on Cybertron.  The ledge was slippery, but I didn't care. I just kept 
walking with the others. It was night time, dark, and a few thrill 
seakers out for fun.  But someone shot at us and we tried to move out 
of the way.  I watched as one friend fall off the ledge.  It was like 
watching a hologram piture show, but in slow motion."  she stopped 
for a moment and looked at the floor.

"All I could do was watch.  I saw him fall to the water below.  I 
never saw him again.  i don't know if he survived or not. But he was 
gone.  Then we were fired upon again.  I tried to move fast enough, 
but I wasn't.  The ledge was shot out from under me and I fell. I saw 
the world pass by like a blurr.  I looked at the ledge but my other 
friends had gone.  I fell into the water.  It was like hitting 
steal." she paused.
" I don't know how I got to the streets again, I just found myself 
walking down the streets of Cybertron and not knowing how I got 
there." she paused, "but that's why I'm terrified of heights.  I have 
been ever since that  night."
